name: 2 Player Snowball Fight (eboatwright)
description:
This was uploaded at one point, but I had to take it down and reupload it.

Blue Player is Left and Right Arrows to move, Up Arrow to jump, and to throw a snowball is Down Arrow.

Green Player is A-D to move, W to jump, and to throw a snowball is S.

This was my first finished game made in I think 2017? I used GamesPlusJames' tutorial series.
